The #Cavs confirm Ochai Agbaji will wear no. 30 for the team.

The last player to do so was Dahntay Jones during the 2016-17 season.

If the #Cavs are unable to re-sign Collin Sexton, the Indiana Pacers are the betting favorites at +200 followed by the Detroit Pistons (+300) and Washington Wizards (+350), per @betonline_ag.

This all tracks based on my reporting leading up to tomorrow.
